title: Big Tech surveillance: The invisible, omnipresent force watching your every move
description: Google, Apple and other tech giants harvest personal data (emails, searches, location) under the guise of “free” services, enabling government and law enforcement to bypass warrants and conduct mass surveillance. Artificial intelligence automates surveillance, analyzing behavior, predicting dissent and enforcing biases—turning digital footprints into tools for social control, censorship and policing. Emergencies (like COVID) accelerate […]
content:

title: How digital health tools strengthen care when patients are the core focus
description: From patient portals and text messages to wearable devices and artificial intelligence, digital health technologies are becoming a significant part of medical care. But technology alone isn't enough to improve health outcomes. According to Daniel Amante, Ph.D., MPH, assistant professor of population & quantitative health sciences at UMass Chan Medical School, the most effective tools are those designed with the end user's input upfront to address specific challenges that both providers and patients face.
content: From patient portals and text messages to wearable devices and artificial intelligence, digital health technologies are becoming a significant part of medical care. But technology alone isn't enough to improve health outcomes. According to Daniel Ama... [6601 chars]

title: American excellence in English teaching empowers Batanes educators
description: THROUGH its Regional English Language Office, the US Embassy in the Philippines equipped 50 high school teachers from across the island province of Batanes with innovative American teaching approaches that integrate artificial intelligence (AI), critical thinking, and communication skills.

title: 'People's dad' Jensen Huang praises, pushes Nvidia suppliers on mobbed Taiwan visit
description: TAIPEI — Nvidia Jensen Huang praised and lightly cajoled his major Taiwanese suppliers to produce more to help power strong demand for artificial intelligence (AI), capping a visit to the island of his birth, where he has been mobbed by adoring fans at every step.

title: SpaceX seeks FCC nod for solar-powered satellite data centers for AI

title: Two-day Malappuram Science Fest concludes
